attributes.action: provide more seating in public for everyone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that there is insufficient public seating in the streets and main roads of our cities.  We would like new, secure, vandal-proof benches to be provided.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Local Authorities in the first instance.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
